SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CAR_PARK WHERE 1=1
and CAR_PARK_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
and CASE CAR_PARK_TP_NM WHEN 1 THEN '노상' ELSE '노외' END LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
and ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'

SELECT CAR_PARK_MAG_NUM,CAR_PARK_NM, PHONE, ADDRESS, HIT, TO_CHAR(WEEKDAY_START_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS WEEKDAY_START_TIME, TO_CHAR(WEEKDAY_END_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS WEEKDAY_END_TIME, TO_CHAR(WEEKEND_START_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS WEEKEND_START_TIME, TO_CHAR(WEEKEND_END_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS WEEKEND_END_TIME,FEE_RATE, TIME_RATE,ADD_FEE, ADD_TIME_RATE, CASE PAYORFREE_DIV WHEN '1' THEN '유료' ELSE '무료' END AS PAYORFREE_DIV, CASE CAR_PARK_TP_NM WHEN 1 THEN '노상' ELSE '노외' END AS CAR_PARK_TP_NM FROM CAR_PARK WHERE CAR_PARK_MAG_NUM = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE CAR_PARK SET CAR_PARK_NM = #{parknm}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDRESS = #{add}, PAYORFREE_DIV = #{div}, CAR_PARK_TP_NM = #{tpnm}, WEEKDAY_START_TIME = TO_DATE(#{wkdaystart}, 'HH24:MI:SS'), WEEKDAY_END_TIME = TO_DATE(#{wkdayend}, 'HH24:MI:SS'), WEEKEND_START_TIME = TO_DATE(#{wkendstart}, 'HH24:MI:SS'), WEEKEND_END_TIME = TO_DATE(#{wkendend}, 'HH24:MI:SS'), FEE_RATE = #{fee}, TIME_RATE = #{time}, ADD_TIME_RATE = #{addtime}, ADD_FEE = #{addfee} WHERE CAR_PARK_MAG_NUM = #{no}
